src_text: Khabinete yi hlangane hi Ravunharhu, 28 Nyenyanyana 2018, eTuynhuys, Kap Swibohonkulu swa Khabinete1.
trg_text: Cabinet met on Wednesday, 28 February 2018, at Tuynhuys, Cape Tow Issues in the environment1.

src_text: Mbulavulo wa Mpimanyeto wa Rixaka Khabinete yi amukela ntshembo lowukulu lowu paluxiweke eka Mpimanyeto wa Rixaka wa 2018 lowu andlariweke ePalamende, Kapa, vhiki leri nga hundz Eka moya lowu wa ha ku va ka kona wa mpfuxelelo lowu khomeke tiko ra ka hina lero saseka, Khabinete yi rhamba MaAfrika-Dzonga hinkwawo ku tirhisana na mfumo ku kurisa ikhonomi ya hina na ku tumbuluxa mitirho leyi dingiwaka swonghas Ku hunguteka eka ntirhiso wa timali ta R85 wa tibiliyoni eka malembe manharhu lama taka ku kombisa vutiyimiseri bya mfumo ku hlanganisa swa timali na avelo wa vurhon wana wa switirhisiwa ku kurisa ikhonom Magoza ya tivisiwile ku hunguta rivilo ra mpfelelo wa xikweleti na ku lawula nkayivelo wa mpimanyeto swinene ku antswisa rimba ra swa timali ta hina na ku nyika MaAfrika-Dzonga ntshembo eka leswi nga humelelaka mikarhi leyi taka swa ikhonomi ya hin
trg_text: Cabinet appreciates the overwhelming confidence expressed in the 2018 National Budget which was tabled in Parliament, Cape Town, last wee In the recent spirit of renewal that has gripped our great nation, Cabinet calls on all South Africans to partner with government to grow our economy and create much-needed job The reduction in expenditure of R85 billion over the next three years demonstrates government s commitment to fiscal consolidation and the prudent allocation of resources to grow the econom

src_text: Khabinete ya tiboha leswaku miphalalo yi ta kombeta eka ku kula ka ikhonomi ya tiko ra ka hina, yi tiyisisa xiyimo xa rona xa timali na ku sirhelela xiyimo xa rona xa giredi ya vuvekis Mpimanyeto wa Rixaka wa 2018 wu seketela lava sweleke erixakeni ra hina hi ku tirhisa pfhumba ra mpfuneto wa vaaki na dyondzo ya le henhla ya mahala eka swichudeni leswi humaka emitini leyi swelek Tanihi angulo eka ku khumbeka loku boxiweke eka miengetelo ya Xibalo xa Mixavo (VAT), Khabinete yi le ku langutisiseni ka ku ndlandlamuxa nxaxamelo wa tinhundzu ta masungulo leti nga
trg_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Customary Initiation Bill of 2018 to Parliamen The Bill seeks to protect, promote and regulate the governance aspect of the practice of customary initiatioIt provides national norms and standards aimed at the protection of life and the prevention of injuries and all forms of abuse experienced by initiates Cabinet approved for the submission of the National Qualifications Framework Amendment Bill of 2016 to Parliamen The Bill, which amends the National Qualifications Framework Act, 2008 (Act 67 of 2008), strengthens the Act by improving measures to deal with issues of misrepresentation, imposes consequences on persons who misrepresent their qualifications or organisations that issue invalid qualificationIt also proposes regulations to ensure that fraudulent qualifications are referred to the relevant professional bodies (database of individuals who misrepresented their qualifications).

src_text: hakerisiwiki xibalo Malembexidzana ya Nelson Mandela Khabinete yi tikatsa na Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa eka xirhambo xa yena xa MaAfrika-Dzonga ku tiyisisa hi vuntshwa ku tiboha ka yona ka nhlanganelo ku korhokela vanhu tanihiloko hi ya emahlweni hi tlangela malembexidzana ya ku velekiwa ka khale ka Phuresidente Nelson Mandel Madiba i Phuresidente wo sungula wa Afrika-Dzonga ya xidemokirasi naswona a ta va a ri na 100 wa malembe hi vukhale hi siku ra 18 Mawuwani 2012.
trg_text: Cabinet joins President Cyril Ramaphosa in his call on South Africans to reaffirm a shared commitment to serve people as we continue to celebrate the centenary of the birth of former President Nelson Mandel Madiba is the first President of a Democratic South Africa and would have turned 100 years of age on 18 July 2012.

src_text: Madiba i mfungho wa misava loyi a xiximiwaka misava hinkwayo tanihi Nghwazi ya Timfanelo ta Ximunhu, loyi a nga yiki hi nghohe na ku va loyi a nga yiki hi rimbew U tirhile ntirho wa nkoka swonghasi eka ku hlanganisa MaAfrika-Dzonga, na ku hlohlotela vun we bya xidemokirasi eAfrika hinkwaro na le misaveni hinkway Ku tlangeriwa ko sungula ka malembexidzana ya Nelson Mandela ku vile kona hi nkarhi wa Samiti ya Nhlangano wa Afrika eAddis Ababa, Ethiopia hi Sunguti 2018.
trg_text: Madiba is a global icon who is revered worldwide as a Champion of Human Rights, non-racism and non-sexis He played a critical role in unifying South Africans, and inspiring democratic unity across Africa and the glob The first celebration of Nelson Mandela s centenary took place during the African Union Summit in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia in January 2018.

src_text: Swiendleko swo tala swi ta endliwa etikweni hinkwaro nan waka ku ehleketa hi vutomi bya Tatana Madib
trg_text: Cabinet will in the next meeting also outline a programme for the celebration of the Centenary of Mama Albertina Sisulu

src_text: Khabinete yi rhamba MaAfrika-Dzonga hinkwawo ku tikatsa eka mitlangelo ya malembexidzana emitirhweni, eswikolweni, etikerekeni na le ka mihlangano ya vaaki ya von Yi rhamba munhu un wana na un wana wa hina nan waka ku encenyeta mikhuvanene ya Nelson Mandela hi ku tirha hi tindlela ta hina ku aka tiko leri nga na vun we, leri nga yiki hi nghohe, leri nga yiki hi rimbewu na ku va leri humelelak Nakambe tiko ri tlangela malembexidzana ya yin wana ya tintombi ta kahle ta tiko ra Afrika Manana Albertina Sisulu, loyi a nyiketeke vutomi bya yena ku lwela ntshunxeko wa vavasati na ntshunxeko wa Afrika-Dzong Khabinete eka nhlengeletano leyi landzelaka yi ta tlhela yi hlamusela nongonoko wa ku tlangela Malembexidzana ya Manana Albertina Sisul
trg_text: A number of events will be held throughout the country this year to reflect on the life of Tata Madib Cabinet calls upon all South Africans to join in the centenary celebrations in their workplaces, schools, churches and civic organisation It calls on each one of us this year to emulate the values of Nelson Mandela by working in our respective ways to build a united, non-racist, non-sexist and prosperous countr The country also celebrates the centenary of one of the great daughters of the African soil Mama Albertina Sisulu, who dedicated her life to fight for the emancipation of women and the liberation of South Afric

src_text: Dyandza Khabinete yi khensa matshalatshala lama nga heriki ntamu lama endliweke hi Komiti ya le Xikarhi ka Vaholobye eka Dyandza swin we na vakhomaxiave eka swiyenge hinkwaswo swa mfumo na rixaka eka ku tirhana na swiyimo swa dyandza leswi phikelelaka leswi hlaseleke swiphemu swi nga ri swingani swa tik Handle ka ntiyiso wa leswaku Afrika-Dzonga i tiko leri nga na vukali bya mati, switandzhaku swa nkufumelo wa xibakabaka swi ya emahlweni swi khumba manelo ya mpfula, hikwalaho ka sweswo swi vanga mipimo ya madamu ya hina ku tshama yi ri ehans
trg_text: Drought Cabinet appreciates the relentless efforts made by the Inter-Ministerial Committee on Drought together with stakeholders in all spheres of government and society in dealing with the persistent drought conditions that have hit several parts of the countr Apart from the fact that South Africa is a water-scarce country, the effects of global warming continue to affect the rain patterns, thus causing our dam levels to remain lo

src_text: Xipano xa Ntirho wa le Xikarhi ka Vaholobye eka Dyandza xi ya emahlweni xi humelerisa ntirho exikarhi ka mfumo wa rixaka, swifundzakulu na timasipala eka tindhawu leti khumbekeke hi dyandza hinkwat Leswi swi katsa ku simeka magoza ya nkarhinyana, ya nkarhi wa le xikarhi na wo leha ku lulamisa na ku hunguta ntshikelelo lowu nga vaka kona wa dyandza ler Mfumo wu endlile leswaku timali ti kumeka ku nyika mpfuneto wa nkarhinyana eka swifundzakulu leswi khumbekek Wu nyikile mali ya nhlayiso wo phalala leyi nga na nkoka wa R473 wa timiliyoni na R6 wa tibiliyoni eka lembeximali ra 2018/19 ku engetela swimakiwakulu swa mati eKapa-Vupeladyambu, Kapa-Vuhumadyambu na Kapa-N walung Khabinete yi rhamba hinkwerhu ku ya emahlweni hi tirhisana na mfumo eka ku hlayisa mati hi ku ya tirhisa hi ndlela ya vutihlamuleri naswona hi matsananatsanan Khabinete yi tama ya ha tibohile ku endla Afrika-Dzonga tiko leri nga hlawuriwaka hi vayeni naswona swi tano eka vavekisi lava nga tshukaka va va kona Ku dlayeteriwa ka maphorisa Khabinete yi yisa michavelelo eka mindyangu na vanghana va ntlhanu wa maphorisa na khale ka socha lava va ha ku dlayiwaka hi ndlela ya tihanyi eka nhlaselo wa le Xitichini xa Maphorisa xa Ngcobo eKapa-Vuhumadyamb Khabinete yi sola swinene ku dlayeteriwa ku ri hava xivangelo ka vavanuna na vavasati lava hi korhokelak Ku lahlekeriwa hi phorisa rin we, socha kumbe munhu wihi kumbe wihi un wana loyi a tirhaka ku sirhelela rixaka na vanhu va hina a swi amukelek
trg_text: The Inter-Ministerial Task Team on Drought continues to facilitate work between national government, provinces and municipalities in all drought-affected area This includes implementing short, medium and long-term measures to address and mitigate the potential impact of this drough Government has made funds available to provide short-term assistance to affected province It has provided a relief grant worth R473 million and an additional R6 billion in the 2018/19 financial year to augment water infrastructure in the Western Cape

src_text: Khabinete yi tibohile, hi ku tirhisana na Holobye wa Maphorisa, ku endla xihi kumbe xihi lexi nga kotekaka ku antswisa switichi swa hina swa maphorisa ku sivela mihlaselo yo tano emikarhini leyi tak Khabinete yi kombela ku ya emahlweni eka vatswari na rixaka hi ku angarhela ku tiyisisa leswaku vana va hlayisiwa hi mikarhi hinkwayo na ku tirhisana na vayimeri vo sindzisa nawu ku sirhelela timfanelo ta van Muxaka wihi kumbe wihi wa nxaniso ehenhla ka n wana wu fanele ku humeseriwa erivaleni na ku mangariwa xikan wekan w Hi ku tirhisana, hi nga endla miganga ya ka hina yi tshama yi hlayisekile na ku tiyisisa leswaku vanhu lava endlaka vugevenga va pfumala vutumbel Swiboho swa Khabinete1.
trg_text: The loss of one police officer, soldier or any other person who serves to protect society and our people is unacceptabl Cabinet has committed, through the Minister of Police, to do whatever possible to capacitate our police stations to prevent such attacks in the futur Cabinet further appeals to parents and society at large to ensure children are kept safe at all times and to partner with law-enforcement agencies to protect the rights of our childre Any form of abuse against a child must be exposed and reported immediatel By working together, we can keep our communities safe and ensure that criminal elements have no place to hid Cabinet decisions

src_text: Khabinete yi pasisile Mpfapfarhuto wa Tirhele leri Pfuxetiweke eka Pholisi Vutleketli ya Rixaka ku va wu kandziyisiwa ku kuma mavonelo ya vaak Pholisi yi na xikongomelo xa ku nyika sisiteme ya vutleketli leyi hlanganisiweke na makungu ya tisekitara tin wana leti fambelanaka ku hunguta havumbirhi bya madurhelo ya ku khandziya xifambo ku ya entirhweni na ku endla bindz Nakambe yi yelanisa makungu ya vutleketli ya tiko eka mitolovelo ya vutleketli bya misava Khabinete yi pasisile Mpfampfarhuto wo Sungula eka Pholisi ya Magondzo ya Afrika-Dzonga ku va wu kandziyisiwa ku kuma mavonelo ya vaak Pholisi leyi yi ta nyika rimba ro angarhela leri ri endlaka leswaku magondzo ya Afrika-Dzonga ya lawuriwa ku antswa, ya va ya hlayisekile swinene na ku katsa tinxaka hinkwayo ta vutleketli ku humelerisa endlelo leri yisekaka emahlweni ra malawulelo ya magondz Wu lawula swinawana swa le magondzweni, switirhisiwa, vuhlayiseki, ku nyikiwa ka timali ta magondzo na vutleketli lebyi nga fambiki hi njhin
trg_text: Cabinet approved the Draft Revised White Paper on National Transport Policy to be published for public comment The policy aims to provide a transport system that is integrated with other related sector plans so as to reduce both the cost of commuting and doing busines It also aligns the country s transportation plans to the global transportation trends Cabinet approved the Green Paper on Roads Policy for South Africa to be published for public comment The policy provides the overarching framework that ensures South Africa s roads are better managed, safer and include all modes of transport to deliver a sustainable approach to roads managemen It guides the road regulations, infrastructure, safety, road funding and non- motorised transport

src_text: Khabinete yi nyikiwile vuxokoxoko hi mikumo ya Mbalango wa Rixaka wa Nhluvukiso wa Nkambisiso na Ndzavisiso (Mbalango wa R&D) wa 2015/16.
trg_text: Cabinet was briefed on the findings of the 2015/16 National Survey of Research and Experimental Development (R&D Survey).R&D is an integral part of the country s socio-economic developmen

src_text: R&D i xiphemu xa nkoka xa nhluvukiso wa ikhonomi ya vanhu va tik Lawa ya vile matshalatshala ya nhlanganelo ya mfumo, vumaki na mihlangano ya ndzavisis Xiviko lexi xa kumeka eka webusayiti ya Ndzawulo ya Sayense na Thekinoloji (DST): wwdsgoza Khabinete yi pasisile tidizayini ta ntlhandlamano wa swingwece swa muhlengeleti swo tsundzuka wa 2018, lowu nga ta humesiwa hi Khamphani ya Mint ya Afrika-Dzong Nhlengeleto wa tidizayini ta 2018 wu ta va ku tlangela Malembexidzana ya Nelson Mandel Mihlengeleto leyi yi rhangeriwile hi swingwece swo tsundzuka swa 2017 leswi tlangeleke Afrika-Dzonga ehansi ka nkongomelo wa Ntshunxeko, Xidemokirasi na Mifuw Milawumbisi1.
trg_text: This has been collective efforts of government, industry and research institution The report is available on the Department of Science and Technology (DST) website: wwdsgoza Cabinet approved the designs of the 2018 commemorative collector s coin series, which will be produced by the South African Mint Compan The 2018 designs collection will be celebrating the Nelson Mandela Centenar These collections were preceded by the 2017 commemorative coins that celebrated South Africa under the theme of Freedom, Democracy and Culture Bills1.

src_text: Khabinete yi pasisile ku rhumeriwa ka Nawumbisi wa Ngoma ya Xintu wa 2018 ePalamend Nawumbisi wu lava ku sirhelela, ku kondletela na ku lawula xiphemu xa mafumelo ya endlelo ra ngoma ya xint Wu nyika maendlelo na mipimo ya rixaka leyi nga na xikongomelo xa nsirhelelo wa vutomi na nsivelo wa timbanga na tindlela hinkwato ta nxaniso lowu vakwerha va hlanganaka na wona Khabinete yi pasisile ku rhumeriwa ka Nawumbisi-ndzhundzhuluxo wa Rimba ra Mithwaso ya Rixaka wa 2016 ePalamend Nawumbisi lowu wu hundzuluxa Nawu wa Rimba ra Mithwaso wa Rixaka, 2008 (Nawu wa 67 wa 2008), wu tiyisa Nawu hi ku antswisa magoza ya ku tirhana na swiphiqo swa vunwa, wu rhwexa switandzhaku eka vanhu lava va nyikaka mithwaso ya vona ya vuxisi kumbe mihlangano leyi yi nyikaka mithwaso leyi nga riki enawinNakambe wu ringanyeta swinawana swa ku tiyisisa leswaku mithwaso ya vuxisi yi kongomisiwa eka tihuvo ta xiphurofexinali leti faneleke (nhlayisa-switiviwa ya vanhu lava va nyikeke mithwaso ya vona ya vuxisi).
trg_text: This is the first hosting in AfricThe WTCOH calls for committed action and provides a platform for governments, civil-society organisations, United Nations agencies, international organisations, health workers and other stakeholders to discuss shared knowledge and experiences, particularly regarding to youth and women who are exposed to tobacco usHosting the conference contributes towards addressing the National Development Plan s goals by creating awareness and education on the harmful effects of tobacco use, and the need to intensify tobacco control measures On the 10 and 11 March the IEC will open the Voting Registration Centres for people to come and register and check their registration detail Cabinet urges all eligible voters to visit their voting stations to update the voters

src_text: Nakambe wu lulamisa ku nyikiwa ka vululameri bya mithwaso ya matiko mambe Khabinete yi pasisile Nawumbisi wa Vuhlayiseki bya le Swiporweni wa 2017 ku va wu kandziyisiwa ku kuma mavonelo ya vaak Nawumbisi lowu wu lava ku antswisa vuhlayiseki bya le swiporweni na ku tumbuluxa xivumbeko xa mafumelo ku fambisa ntirho wa Vulawuri bya Vuhlayiseki bya le Swiporweni bya Afrika-Dzong Nakambe wu yelanisiwe na Pholisi ya Swiporo ya Rixaka hi mayelana na ku tiyisiwa ka vuvekatihlo bya vuhlayiseki, na ntlakuso na nsindziso wa vuhlayiseki eswiporweni swa hin
trg_text: It also addresses the accreditation of foreign qualifications Cabinet approved the Railway Safety Bill of 2017 to be published for public comment The Bill seeks to improve railway safety and create a governance structure to oversee the work of the Rail Safety Regulator of South Afric It is also aligned to the National Rail Policy regarding the strengthening of safety monitoring, and the promotion and enforcement of safety in our railways Cabinet approved for the Draft Economic Regulation of Transport Bill of 2017 to be published for public comments and consultatio The Bill addresses the regulatory and capacity gaps in respect of provision of a cost-effective and efficient transport syste Upcoming events1.

src_text: Khabinete yi pasisile Nawumbisimpfapfarhutwa wa Vulawuri bya Ikhonomi ya Vutleketli wa 2017 ku va wu kandziyisiwa ku kuma mavonelo ya vaaki na ku tihlanganisa na vaak Nawumbisi wu lulamisa mavangwa yo lawula na ya vuswikoti hi mayelana na ku nyikiwa ka sisiteme ya vutleketli leyi nga na nxavo lowu pfunaka na ku va wa vuswikot Mitlangu leyi landzelaka1.

src_text: Lebyi i vurhurhelo byo sungula eAfrikWTCOH yi rhamba goza ro tiboha na ku nyika ndlela eka mifumo, mihlangano ya vaaki lava nga na ntsakelo wun we, vayimeri va Nhlangano wa Matiko mihlangano ya matiko ya misava, vatirhi va swa rihanyu na vakhomaxiave van wana ku kanela vutivi na mitokoto ya nhlanganelo, ngopfungopfu hi mayelana na vantshwa na vavasati lava va kumeka eka xiyimo xa ku tirhisiwa ka folKu rhurhela khomferense swi hoxa xandla eka ku lulamisa swikongomelokulu swa Kungu ra Nhluvukiso ra Rixaka hi ku tumbuluxa ndzemukiso na dyondzo ya switandzhaku swo vavisa swa ntirhiso wa fole, na xidingo xa ku tiyisa magoza yo lawula fole Hi ti 10 na 11 Nyenyankulu IEC yi ta pfula Tisenthara ta Ntsariso wo Vhota leswaku vanhu va ta va ta tsarisa na ku kamba vuxokoxoko bya vona bya ntsaris
trg_text: Police killings Cabinet expresses condolences to the families and friends of the five police officers and a former soldier who were recently brutally murdered in an attack on the Ngcobo Police Station in the Eastern Cap Cabinet strongly condemns any senseless killing of our servicemen and wome

src_text: Khabinete yi khutaza vavhoti lava fikelelaka hinkwavo ku endzela switichi swa vona swo vhotela ku ya pfuxeta nxaxamelo wa vavhoti hi ku lulamisela mihlawulo ya mani na mani ya 2019.
trg_text: The 2018 National Budget supports the poor in our society through a comprehensive social assistance programme and fee-free tertiary education for students from poor household

src_text: Khabinete yi rhamba ngopfungopfu vavhoti vo sungula ku tiyisisa leswaku va teka xiave eka mfanelo ya vona ya xidemokirasi xa vumbiwa ya ku vhota hi ku ya va ya tsarisela ku vhotMahelo lama ya vhiki ra ntsariso ya ta va xiendleko xa nkoka lexi nga ta hetelela eka phurojeke ya malembe mambirhi ya ku kuma tikherefu ta vutshamo ta vavhoti hinkwavo lava tsarisekSwitichi swo vhotela swi ta pfula exikarhi ka 08:00 na 17:00 ku pfuna vavhoti lavantshwa ku titsarisela ku vhota, na ku pfumelela vavhoti lava tsariseke lava va rhurheleke kun wana ku tsarisa hi vuntshwa eka xifundza xo vhotela lexi lulameke na ku pfuxeta vuxokoxoko bya vona bya tikherefu lebyi nga eka nxaxamelo wa vavhot Mahungu1.

trg_text: The steps announced to slow the pace of debt accumulation and contain the budget deficit greatly improve our fiscal framework and give South Africans confidence in the future prospects of our econom

src_text: Terreblanche, loyi a hundzeke emisaveni a ri na malembe ya 84 hi vukhale Khabinete yi hoyozela Holobye Naledi Pandor eka ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka yena hi Yunivhesiti ya Leiden eNetherlands tanihi Xirho xo Xiximiwa xa Phurofesa yo Endzela ya Ntivotinyeleti na Nhluvukis Leswi i ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka mifikelelo loku nga tolovelekangiki ka Holobye eka ku endla leswaku sayense yi tirhiseka ku humesa eneji, ngopfungopfu, ntivotinyeleti, tanihi xitirho xa nhluvukiso wa misava na mbuyelo wa rixak Ku thoriwaKu thoriwa hinkwako ku ta fanele ku landzelela ntiyisiso wa mithwaso na mbhasiso lowu faneleke Man Lerato Mataboge tanihi Xandla xa Mulawuri-Jenerali (DDG): Mabindzu na Vuvekisi bya Afrika-Dzonga, Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki (dti) Man Shandokane Evelyn Masotja tanihi DDG: Vulawuri bya Vatirhisi na Tikhamphani, dti Man Vuyelwa Vumendlini tanihi DDG: Pholisi ya Ikhonomi ya Matiko ya Misava na ya Xifundza, Nkwama wa Timali wa Rixaka Tat Joseph Tebogo Leshope tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Matirhelo wa SENTECH Man Vuyo Zitumane tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Matirhelo (CEO) wa Amatola Water Adv Seeng Catherine Ntsaba-Letele tanihi Mulavisisinkulu wa Swivilelo wa Vukorhokeri bya Vulavisisi bya Swivilelo swa Swikimi swa Vaakandhawu Tat Edward Mamadise tanihi CEO wa Mulawuri wa Rixaka wa Swikoxometo Leswi Bohaka Dok Sagren Moodley tanihi muyimeri wo huma eka DST eka Khansele ya Tiphurofexini ta Sayense ya swa Ntumbuluko ya Afrika-Dzonga Lava thoriweke hi vuntshwa eka Bodo ya Swikambelo swa Tiphetente: Man Shanaaz Tiry Mahomed Man Sandra Cleiland Phurof Christiena Maria van der Bank; na Adv Nhlanhla Paul SibisSwivutiso:Man Phumla WilliamsMuvulavuleri wo Khomela wa KhabineteSelifoni: 083 501 0139
